changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE station_name ( station_id bigserial NOT NULL, "IMOS_SITE_CODE" text, "STATION_NAME" text, "NODE" text, "STATE" text, "STATION_DEPTH_M" double precision, "LONGITUDE" double precision, "LATITUDE" double precision, "START_DATE" date, geom geometry NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT station_id_pkey PRIMARY KEY (station_id) )

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig ( measurement bigserial NOT NULL, "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL, "NRS_TRIP_CODE" text, "NRS_SAMPLE_CODE" text, "STATION_NAME" text, "IMOS_SITE_CODE" text, "LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" text NOT NULL, "SAMPLE_DEPTH_M" double precision, "CPHL_C3" double precision, "MG_DVP" double precision, "CPHL_C2" double precision, "CPHL_C1" double precision, "CPHL_C1C2" double precision, "CPHLIDE_A" double precision, "PHIDE_A" double precision, "PERID" double precision, "PYROPHIDE_A" double precision, "BUT_FUCO" double precision, "FUCO" double precision, "NEO" double precision, "KETO_HEX_FUCO" double precision, "PRAS" double precision, "VIOLA" double precision, "HEX_FUCO" double precision, "ASTA" double precision, "DIADCHR" double precision, "DIADINO" double precision, "DINO" double precision, "ANTH" double precision, "ALLO" double precision, "DIATO" double precision, "ZEA" double precision, "LUT" double precision, "CANTHA" double precision, "GYRO" double precision, "DV_CPHL_B" double precision, "CPHL_B" double precision, "DV_CPHL_B_AND_CPHL_B" double precision, "DV_CPHL_A" double precision, "CPHL_A" double precision, "DV_CPHL_A_AND_CPHL_A" double precision, "ECHIN" double precision, "PHYTIN_B" double precision, "PHYTIN_A" double precision, "LYCO" double precision, "BETA_EPI_CAR" double precision, "BETA_BETA_CAR" double precision, "ALPHA_BETA_CAR" double precision, "PYROPHYTIN_A" double precision, "QC_FLAG" text, "SAMPLE_COMMENTS" text, CONSTRAINT measurement_pkey_phypig PRIMARY KEY (measurement) )

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql:
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig_data ; CREATE VIEW anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig_data as WITH table_a AS ( SELECT station_name."STATION_NAME", station_name."LATITUDE", station_name."LONGITUDE", station_name.geom FROM station_name ), table_b AS ( SELECT anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig.measurement, anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" , anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."NRS_TRIP_CODE", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."NRS_SAMPLE_CODE", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."STATION_NAME", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."IMOS_SITE_CODE", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."SAMPLE_DEPTH_M", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."CPHL_C3", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."MG_DVP", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."CPHL_C2", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."CPHL_C1", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."CPHL_C1C2", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."CPHLIDE_A", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."PHIDE_A", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."PERID", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."PYROPHIDE_A", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."BUT_FUCO", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."FUCO", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."NEO", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."KETO_HEX_FUCO", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."PRAS", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."VIOLA", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."HEX_FUCO", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."ASTA", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."DIADCHR", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."DIADINO", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."DINO", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."ANTH", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."ALLO", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."DIATO", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."ZEA", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."LUT", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."CANTHA", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."GYRO", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."DV_CPHL_B", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."CPHL_B", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."DV_CPHL_B_AND_CPHL_B", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."DV_CPHL_A", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."CPHL_A", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."DV_CPHL_A_AND_CPHL_A", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."ECHIN", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."PHYTIN_B", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."PHYTIN_A", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."LYCO", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."BETA_EPI_CAR", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."BETA_BETA_CAR", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."ALPHA_BETA_CAR", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."PYROPHYTIN_A", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."QC_FLAG", anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig."SAMPLE_COMMENTS" FROM anmn_nrs_bgc_phypig )
SELECT table_a."LATITUDE", table_a."LONGITUDE", table_a.geom, table_b.* FROM table_a, table_b WHERE table_a."STATION_NAME" = table_b."STATION_NAME" ORDER BY table_b."STATION_NAME", table_b."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME";

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton ( measurement bigserial NOT NULL, "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL, "NRS_TRIP_CODE" text, "NRS_SAMPLE_CODE" text, "STATION_NAME" text, "IMOS_SITE_CODE" text, "LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" text NOT NULL, "REPLICATE" text, "PROCHLOROCOCCUS_CELLSPERML" double precision, "SYNECOCHOCCUS_CELLSPERML" double precision, "PICOEUKARYOTES_CELLSPERML" double precision, "PROCHLOROCOCCUS_FLAG" text, "SYNECOCHOCCUS_FLAG" text, "PICOEUKARYOTES_FLAG" text, "SAMPLE_COMMENTS" text, CONSTRAINT measurement_pkey_picoplankton PRIMARY KEY (measurement) )

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton_data ; CREATE VIEW anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton_data as WITH table_a AS ( SELECT station_name."STATION_NAME", station_name."LATITUDE", station_name."LONGITUDE", station_name.geom FROM station_name ), table_b AS ( SELECT anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton.measurement, anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME", anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton."LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" , anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton."NRS_TRIP_CODE", anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton."NRS_SAMPLE_CODE", anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton."STATION_NAME", anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton."IMOS_SITE_CODE", anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton."PROCHLOROCOCCUS_CELLSPERML", anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton."SYNECOCHOCCUS_CELLSPERML", anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton."PICOEUKARYOTES_CELLSPERML", anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton."PROCHLOROCOCCUS_FLAG", anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton."SYNECOCHOCCUS_FLAG", anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton."PICOEUKARYOTES_FLAG", anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton."SAMPLE_COMMENTS" FROM anmn_nrs_bgc_picoplankton ) SELECT table_a."LATITUDE", table_a."LONGITUDE", table_a.geom, table_b.* FROM table_a, table_b WHERE table_a."STATION_NAME" = table_b."STATION_NAME" ORDER BY table_b."STATION_NAME", table_b."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME";

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE anmn_nrs_bgc_chemistry ( measurement bigserial NOT NULL, "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL, "NRS_TRIP_CODE" text, "NRS_SAMPLE_CODE" text, "STATION_NAME" text, "IMOS_SITE_CODE" text, "LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" text NOT NULL, "SAMPLE_DEPTH_M" double precision, "SALINITY" double precision, "SALINITY_FLAG" text, "SALINITY_COMMENTS" text, "SILICATE_UMOL_PER_L" double precision, "SILICATE_FLAG" text, "NITRATE_UMOL_PER_L" double precision, "NITRATE_FLAG" text, "PHOSPHATE_UMOL_PER_L" double precision, "PHOSPHATE_FLAG" text, "AMMONIUM_UMOL_PER_L" double precision, "AMMONIUM_FLAG" text, "NUTRIENT_COMMENTS" text, "TCO2_UMOL_PER_KG" double precision, "CARBON_FLAG" text, "CARBON_COMMENTS" text, "TALKALINITY_UMOL_PER_KG" double precision, "ALKALINITY_FLAG" text, "ALKALINITY_COMMENTS" text, "OXYGEN_UMOL_PER_L" double precision, "OXYGEN_FLAG" text, "OXYGEN_COMMENTS" text, CONSTRAINT measurement_pkey_chemistry PRIMARY KEY (measurement) )

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS anmn_nrs_bgc_chemistry_data ; CREATE VIEW anmn_nrs_bgc_chemistry_data AS WITH table_a AS ( SELECT station_name."STATION_NAME", station_name."LATITUDE", station_name."LONGITUDE", station_name.geom FROM station_name ), table_b AS ( SELECT measurement, "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME", "LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" , "NRS_TRIP_CODE", "NRS_SAMPLE_CODE", "STATION_NAME", "IMOS_SITE_CODE", "SAMPLE_DEPTH_M", "SALINITY", "SALINITY_FLAG", "SALINITY_COMMENTS", "SILICATE_UMOL_PER_L", "SILICATE_FLAG", "NITRATE_UMOL_PER_L", "NITRATE_FLAG", "PHOSPHATE_UMOL_PER_L", "PHOSPHATE_FLAG", "AMMONIUM_UMOL_PER_L", "AMMONIUM_FLAG", "NUTRIENT_COMMENTS", "TCO2_UMOL_PER_KG", "CARBON_FLAG", "CARBON_COMMENTS", "TALKALINITY_UMOL_PER_KG", "ALKALINITY_FLAG", "ALKALINITY_COMMENTS", "OXYGEN_UMOL_PER_L", "OXYGEN_FLAG", "OXYGEN_COMMENTS" FROM anmn_nrs_bgc_chemistry ) SELECT table_a."LATITUDE", table_a."LONGITUDE", table_a.geom, table_b.* from table_a,table_b where table_a."STATION_NAME" = table_b."STATION_NAME" ORDER BY "STATION_NAME","UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" ;

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_biomass ( measurement bigserial NOT NULL, "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL, "NRS_TRIP_CODE" text, "NRS_SAMPLE_CODE" text, "STATION_NAME" text, "IMOS_SITE_CODE" text, "LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" text, "LONGITUDE" double precision, "LATITUDE" double precision, "MG_PER_M3" double precision, CONSTRAINT measurement_pkey_plankton_biomass PRIMARY KEY (measurement) )

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_biomass_data ; CREATE VIEW anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_biomass_data as WITH table_a AS ( SELECT station_name."STATION_NAME", station_name.geom FROM station_name ), table_b AS ( SELECT anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_biomass."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_biomass."LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" , anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_biomass."NRS_TRIP_CODE", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_biomass."NRS_SAMPLE_CODE", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_biomass."STATION_NAME", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_biomass."IMOS_SITE_CODE", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_biomass."LONGITUDE", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_biomass."LATITUDE", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_biomass."MG_PER_M3" FROM anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_biomass ) SELECT table_a.geom, table_b.* FROM table_a, table_b WHERE table_a."STATION_NAME" = table_b."STATION_NAME"::text ORDER BY table_b."STATION_NAME", table_b."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME";

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton ( measurement bigserial NOT NULL, "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL, "NRS_TRIP_CODE" text, "NRS_SAMPLE_CODE" text, "STATION_NAME" text, "IMOS_SITE_CODE" text, "LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" text, "LONGITUDE" double precision, "LATITUDE" double precision, "TAXON_NAME" text, "FAMILY" text, "GENUS" text, "SPECIES" text, "SEX" text, "LIFE_STAGE" text, "TAXON_GROUP" text, "TAXON_ECO_GROUP" text, "CAAB_CODE" double precision, "TAXON_START_DATE" text, "TAXON_PER_M3" double precision, "SAMPLE_COMMENTS" text, CONSTRAINT measurement_pkey_plankton_zooplankton PRIMARY KEY (measurement) )

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton_data ; CREATE VIEW anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton_data as WITH table_a AS ( SELECT station_name."STATION_NAME", station_name.geom FROM station_name ), table_b AS ( SELECT anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton.measurement, anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton."LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" , anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton."NRS_TRIP_CODE", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton."NRS_SAMPLE_CODE", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton."STATION_NAME", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton."IMOS_SITE_CODE", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton."LONGITUDE", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton."LATITUDE", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton."TAXON_NAME", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton."FAMILY", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton."GENUS", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton."SPECIES", "GENUS" || ' ' || "SPECIES" AS genus_and_species, anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton."SEX", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton."LIFE_STAGE", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton."TAXON_GROUP", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton."TAXON_ECO_GROUP", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton."CAAB_CODE", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton."TAXON_START_DATE", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton."TAXON_PER_M3", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton."SAMPLE_COMMENTS" FROM anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_zooplankton ) SELECT table_a.geom, table_b.* FROM table_a, table_b WHERE table_a."STATION_NAME" = table_b."STATION_NAME" ORDER BY table_b."STATION_NAME", table_b."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME";

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton ( measurement bigserial NOT NULL, "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL, "NRS_TRIP_CODE" text, "NRS_SAMPLE_CODE" text, "STATION_NAME" text, "IMOS_SITE_CODE" text, "LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" text, "LONGITUDE" double precision, "LATITUDE" double precision, "TAXON_NAME" text, "FAMILY" text, "GENUS" text, "SPECIES" text, "TAXON_ECO_GROUP" text, "CAAB_CODE" double precision, "TAXON_START_DATE" text, "CELL_PER_LITRE" double precision, "BIOVOLUME_ML_PER_L" double precision, "SAMPLE_COMMENTS" text, CONSTRAINT measurement_pkey_plankton_phytoplankton PRIMARY KEY (measurement) )

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton_data ; CREATE VIEW anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton_data as WITH table_a AS ( SELECT station_name."STATION_NAME", station_name.geom FROM station_name ), table_b AS ( SELECT anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton.measurement, anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton."LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" , anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton."NRS_TRIP_CODE", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton."NRS_SAMPLE_CODE", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton."STATION_NAME", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton."IMOS_SITE_CODE", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton."LONGITUDE", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton."LATITUDE", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton."TAXON_NAME", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton."FAMILY", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton."GENUS", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton."SPECIES", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton."TAXON_ECO_GROUP", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton."CAAB_CODE", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton."TAXON_START_DATE", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton."CELL_PER_LITRE", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton."BIOVOLUME_ML_PER_L", anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton."SAMPLE_COMMENTS" FROM anmn_nrs_bgc_plankton_phytoplankton ) SELECT table_a.geom, table_b.* FROM table_a, table_b WHERE table_a."STATION_NAME" = table_b."STATION_NAME" ORDER BY table_b."STATION_NAME", table_b."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME";

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi ( measurement bigserial NOT NULL, "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL, "NRS_TRIP_CODE" text, "NRS_SAMPLE_CODE" text, "STATION_NAME" text, "IMOS_SITE_CODE" text, "LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" text NOT NULL, "REPLICATE" text, "TSS_MG_PER_L" double precision, "INORGANIC_FRACTION_MG_PER_L" double precision, "ORGANIC_FRACTION_MG_PER_L" double precision, "TSS_FLAG" text, "TSS_COMMENTS" text, "SECCHI_DEPTH_M" double precision, "SECCHI_FLAG" text, "SECCHI_COMMENTS" text, CONSTRAINT measurement_pkey_tss_secchi PRIMARY KEY (measurement) )

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi_data ; CREATE VIEW anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi_data as WITH table_a AS ( SELECT station_name."STATION_NAME", station_name."LATITUDE", station_name."LONGITUDE", station_name.geom FROM station_name ), table_b AS ( SELECT anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi.measurement, anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS "UTC_TRIP_START_TIME", anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi."LOCAL_TRIP_START_TIME" , anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi."NRS_TRIP_CODE", anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi."NRS_SAMPLE_CODE", anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi."STATION_NAME", anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi."IMOS_SITE_CODE", anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi."REPLICATE", anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi."TSS_MG_PER_L", anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi."INORGANIC_FRACTION_MG_PER_L", anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi."ORGANIC_FRACTION_MG_PER_L", anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi."TSS_FLAG", anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi."TSS_COMMENTS", anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi."SECCHI_DEPTH_M", anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi."SECCHI_FLAG", anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi."SECCHI_COMMENTS" FROM anmn_nrs_bgc_tss_secchi ) SELECT table_a."LATITUDE", table_a."LONGITUDE", table_a.geom, table_b.* FROM table_a, table_b WHERE table_a."STATION_NAME" = table_b."STATION_NAME" ORDER BY table_b."STATION_NAME", table_b."UTC_TRIP_START_TIME";

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE qc_flags ( "QC_FLAG" text NOT NULL, "FLAG_DESCRIPTION" text, CONSTRAINT qc_flags_pkey PRIMARY KEY ("QC_FLAG") )
